skills.title: Front-End Development
skills.description: Experienced in creating dynamic and responsive user interfaces using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like React.js. Strong focus on user experience and performance optimization.

skills.title: Back-End Development
skills.description: Proficient in building robust and scalable server-side applications using Node.js, Express.js, and working with databases such as MongoDB.

skills.title: UI/UX Design
skills.description: Skilled in designing intuitive and engaging user interfaces, with a strong emphasis on user-centered design principles, accessibility, and modern design trends.

skills.title: API Development
skills.description: Experienced in designing and implementing RESTful APIs and GraphQL services. Skilled in creating scalable and efficient endpoints, ensuring robust communication between front-end and back-end systems.

portfolio.title: Drone Calculator
portfolio.description: A web application that calculates drone flight times and battery usage based on user inputs. Project for AccionLAND PVT LTD.

portfolio.title: Cartographic Detail Maps
portfolio.description: Explore geographical data with interactive maps, providing detailed visualizations, layer control, and dynamic data insights.

portfolio.title: Water Reservoir Watch
portfolio.description: Provides real-time monitoring of water reservoir levels, allowing users to track and analyze water storage data for various reservoirs.

portfolio.title: Chess Web Page
portfolio.description: An interactive chess game with features like move validation, user vs. computer & user vs. user play, and game details.

testimonial.title: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science
testimonial.description: Pursing with a focus on software development and computer science fundamentals from Silver Oak University.
testimonial.details: Learned core programming concepts, algorithms, and data structures. Engaged in various projects involving web and mobile development.

testimonial.title: Web Development Internship
testimonial.description: Intensive internship focusing on full-stack web development, including both front-end and back-end technologies at AccionLAND Private Limited.
testimonial.details: Built multiple projects using modern web technologies like React.js, Node.js, and MongoDB. Gained hands-on experience with deployment and testing.
